name: CSS Selectors as Fragment Identifiers Community Group
description:
Decades after the web emerged, hypertext creators pointing to a specific place in a resource they don't control still have to hope or beg that there's a convenient link anchor placed there by the author.  CSS selectors let us point anywhere in a document - let's bring them to hypertext!
 
You can see a very rough initial plan of this at http://simonstl.com/articles/cssFragID.html.
